Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	A Degree in Finance / Accounting or ICAN / ACCA (qualified or almost qualified).
	Proficient in Microsoft excel and accounting softwares like SAP, Orion or similar ERP systems.
	Strong analytical skills and attention to details.
	Good understanding of financial regulations and reconciliation.
	Ability to work independently and collaborativbely within a team.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, Cover Letter and copies of Credentials to:&nbsp;kafuconsultassociates@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Finance Officer Job at Kafu Consult Associates




        
    

        
        Kafu Consult Associates is a management consulting firm duly registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission and handles recruitment, consultancy services, training, travel and tourism arrangements etc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance Officer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	A Degree in Finance / Accounting or ICAN / ACCA (qualified or almost qualified).
	Proficient in Microsoft excel and accounting softwares like SAP, Orion or similar ERP systems.
	Strong analytical skills and attention to details.
	Good understanding of financial regulations and reconciliation.
	Ability to work independently and collaborativbely within a team.


Salary
N300,000 - N400,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, Cover Letter and copies of Credentials to: kafuconsultassociates@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Insurance Officer",
  "description": "Ocean Lord Limited&nbsp;is a Nigeria?based conglomerate specializing in frozen seafood and related goods.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Insurance Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Amuwo Odofin, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Insurance Officer to manage all insurance-related activities and protect the company&rsquo;s assets, operations, and workforce.


Position Summary


	The Insurance Officer will be responsible for managing the company&rsquo;s insurance portfolio, ensuring adequate coverage for all business operations, handling claims, liaising with insurance providers, and mitigating risks to safeguard the organization&rsquo;s interests.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage and review all insurance policies (marine cargo, goods-in-transit, property, coldroom equipment, fire, life, and health insurance).
	Conduct risk assessments for company operations and recommend appropriate insurance coverage.
	Liaise and negotiate with insurance brokers, underwriters, and adjusters to secure favorable terms.
	Maintain comprehensive records of policies, claims, and correspondence.
	Educate and guide management and staff on insurance terms, obligations, and processes.
	Ensure timely renewal of insurance policies to prevent coverage gaps.
	Prepare, submit, and follow up on claims to ensure prompt settlement.
	Ensure compliance with Nigerian insurance laws and regulatory requirements.
	Advise management on risk management strategies to reduce exposure to losses.


Qualifications &amp; Skills


	HND&nbsp;/ B.Sc Degree in Insurance, Risk Management, Finance, Business Administration, or related field.
	Minimum of 3 &ndash; 5 years of experience in corporate insurance management.
	Professional certification such as ACIIN (Associate, Chartered Insurance Institute of Nigeria) is an advantage.
	Strong knowledge of insurance products relevant to FMCG, importation, and coldroom operations.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	High attention to detail and strong record-keeping abilities.
	Integrity, confidentiality, and strong ethical standards.


Benefits


	Competitive salary
	Stable employment in a growing company
	Opportunity to work in a leading FMCG and coldroom facility.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@oceanlord.ng&nbsp;using &ldquo;Insurance Officer Application&rdquo;&nbsp;as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-09-16",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",

  },

Insurance Officer Job at Ocean Lord Limited




        
    

        
        Ocean Lord Limited is a Nigeria?based conglomerate specializing in frozen seafood and related goods.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Insurance Officer

Job Location: Amuwo Odofin, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Insurance Officer to manage all insurance-related activities and protect the company’s assets, operations, and workforce.


Position Summary
     

            
    




	The Insurance Officer will be responsible for managing the company’s insurance portfolio, ensuring adequate coverage for all business operations, handling claims, liaising with insurance providers, and mitigating risks to safeguard the organization’s interests.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage and review all insurance policies (marine cargo, goods-in-transit, property, coldroom equipment, fire, life, and health insurance).
	Conduct risk assessments for company operations and recommend appropriate insurance coverage.
	Liaise and negotiate with insurance brokers, underwriters, and adjusters to secure favorable terms.
	Maintain comprehensive records of policies, claims, and correspondence.
	Educate and guide management and staff on insurance terms, obligations, and processes.
	Ensure timely renewal of insurance policies to prevent coverage gaps.
	Prepare, submit, and follow up on claims to ensure prompt settlement.
	Ensure compliance with Nigerian insurance laws and regulatory requirements.
	Advise management on risk management strategies to reduce exposure to losses.


Qualifications & Skills


	HND / B.Sc Degree in Insurance, Risk Management, Finance, Business Administration, or related field.
	Minimum of 3 – 5 years of experience in corporate insurance management.
	Professional certification such as ACIIN (Associate, Chartered Insurance Institute of Nigeria) is an advantage.
	Strong knowledge of insurance products relevant to FMCG, importation, and coldroom operations.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	High attention to detail and strong record-keeping abilities.
	Integrity, confidentiality, and strong ethical standards.


Benefits


	Competitive salary
	Stable employment in a growing company
	Opportunity to work in a leading FMCG and coldroom facility.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@oceanlord.ng using “Insurance Officer Application” as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
